name: Snowman Rush
description:
Play as "Rush" the Snowman. Use amazing abilities and collect all of the presents in each level.

A controller is recommended to play.
Left Stick -  Forward/ Backward Movement
Right Stick - Rotate Camera
LB/RB - Grapple
Top Button - Break
Bottom Button - Jump
Right Button - Boost
Left Button - Slowmo

Keyboard Controls:
W/S  -  Forward/ Backward Movement
A/D - Rotate Camera
Arrow Keys - Rotate Camera
C - Grapple
R - Break
F  -   Slowmo
Shift -  Boost
Space - Select / Jump

Escape - Quit

Gold Present - Paper-Snowflake-Grapple
Silver Present - Boost-O-Matic
Teal Present  - Slomo

Collect 3 presents in each level to win.
